title: AnandEshvarENa
sahitya:
AnandEshvarENa samrakSitOham nityAnanda rUpOsmi brahmAnanda rUpOsmi


anupallavi

 jnAna pradAna guruguha rUpa cidAnanda nAtha svarUpa prakAshEna


caraNam   avayava trayAtItEna nityEna avasthAtraya sAkSiNAdi shuddhEna bhava pancakOsha
vyatiriktEna buddhEna shiva saccidAnanda rUpENa muktEna shravaNa manana nididhyAsana
samAdhi niSTha parOkSAnubhava svamAtrAvashESita prakAshamAna mahEshvarENa
